key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on global supply chains
Intense competition in the ceiling and wall systems market
Regulatory compliance challenges with building codes and environmental standards
controversies: Historical bankruptcy in 2000, which may still influence investor perceptions
environmental_issues: Resource consumption and waste generation in building material production
Need to achieve carbon neutrality by 2030
social_issues: Workplace safety, despite robust safety management systems
governance_issues: Ongoing investment and compliance efforts for sustainability and ethical practices

sources.title: Armstrong World Industries - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: Armstrong World Industries, Inc. is a Pennsylvania corporation incorporated in 1891. [2] It is an international designer and manufacturer of wall and ceiling building materials. Based in Lancaster, Pennsylvania, AWI has a global manufacturing network of 26 facilities, including nine plants dedicated to its WAVE joint venture.
